Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    io.oasp.module.jpa.common.base.LegacyDaoQuerySupport
    is only provided for compatibility with legacy features from AbstractGenericDao for SearchCriteriaTo and paging support. For future usage it is recommended to use the paging API from spring-data directly. This module oasp4j-jpa only contains deprecated classes and will not be maintained anymore in the future.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol.AbstractAccessControlBasedAuthenticationProvider
    As of bug-fix release 2.1.2 the authentication mechanism changes. It is now based upon custom implementations of UserDetailsService in combination with WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter. For further information have a look at the sample application.

    io.oasp.module.rest.service.impl.json.AbstractJsonDeserializer
    use AbstractJsonDeserializer instead.
    io.oasp.module.jpa.dataaccess.base.AdvancedRevisionEntity
    If you want to have the backward compatibility with your existing code , please use this class else if you are starting the development of application from scratch, please use AdvancedRevisionEntity
    io.oasp.module.jpa.dataaccess.base.AdvancedRevisionListener
    If you want to have the backward compatibility with your existing code , please use this class else if you are starting the development of application from scratch, please use AdvancedRevisionListener
    io.oasp.module.beanmapping.common.impl.DozerBeanMapper
    - use BeanMapperImplDozer instead as this class name clashes with DozerBeanMapper.
    io.oasp.module.beanmapping.common.impl.IdentityConverter
    - use IdentityConverter
    io.oasp.module.rest.service.impl.json.ObjectMapperFactory
    use ObjectMapperFactory instead.
    io.oasp.module.jpa.common.api.to.OrderByTo
    use org.springframework.data.domain.Sort instead
    io.oasp.module.jpa.common.api.to.PaginatedListTo
    use org.springframework.data.domain.Page instead.
    io.oasp.module.jpa.common.api.to.PaginationResultTo
    use org.springframework.data.domain.Page instead.
    io.oasp.module.jpa.common.api.to.PaginationTo
    use org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable instead.
    io.oasp.module.jpa.common.api.to.SearchCriteriaTo
    create your own TO and use org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable for pagination
    io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol.SimpleAccessControlBasedAuthenticationProvider
    As of bug-fix release 2.1.2 the authentication mechanism changes. It is now based upon custom implementations of UserDetailsService in combination with WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter. For further information have a look at the sample application.
    This is an implementation of AbstractUserDetailsAuthenticationProvider based on PrincipalAccessControlProvider and AccessControlProvider.

    This is a simple implementation of AbstractAccessControlBasedAuthenticationProvider.
    io.oasp.module.basic.configuration.SpringProfileConstants
    please use SpringProfileConstants instead.
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    io.oasp.module.jpa.common.api.to.OrderDirection
    user org.springframework.data.domain.Sort.Direction instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    io.oasp.module.rest.service.impl.RestServiceExceptionFacade.KEY_CODE
    use ServiceConstants.KEY_CODE.
    io.oasp.module.rest.service.impl.RestServiceExceptionFacade.KEY_ERRORS
    use ServiceConstants.KEY_ERRORS.
    io.oasp.module.rest.service.impl.RestServiceExceptionFacade.KEY_MESSAGE
    use ServiceConstants.KEY_MESSAGE.
    io.oasp.module.rest.service.impl.RestServiceExceptionFacade.KEY_UUID
    use ServiceConstants.KEY_UUID.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.oasp.module.security.common.base.accesscontrol.AbstractAccessControlBasedAuthenticationProvider.retrievePrincipal(String, UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken)
